SELECT s.ID, s.`NAME`, s.TYPE, s.AMOUNT, s.UNIT, s.REMARK, s.MONEY, s.RECEIPT, s.DATE, s.TYPE_APPLICATION, s.SUPPLIER, s.IS_IN, spo.NUM AS putNum FROM cy_storeroom AS s LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom AS s1 ON(s.ID=s1.PARENT_ID) LEFT JOIN p_storeroom_put AS sp ON(sp.STOREROOM_ID=s1.ID) LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom_put_out AS spo ON(spo.ID=sp.PUT_ID) WHERE s.IS_IN=0 AND s1.TO_DEPT_ID=0 AND (s.AMOUNT=0)=0
AND s.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeroom.name},'%')
AND spo.NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeroom.putNum},'%')
AND s.RECEIPT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeroom.receipt},'%')
AND FIND_IN_SET(s.TYPE_APPLICATION, #{storeroom.typeApplication})
AND FIND_IN_SET(s.SUPPLIER, #{storeroom.supplier})
AND s.DATE >= #{storeroom.createTimeFrom}
AND s.DATE <= #{storeroom.createTimeTo}
AND s.REMARK LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeroom.remark},'%')
AND cs.TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeroom.type},'%')
SELECT PARENT_ID FROM cy_storeroom WHERE FIND_IN_SET(ID, #{storeroomIds})

SELECT s.ID, s.`NAME`, s.TYPE, s.AMOUNT, s.AMOUNT_DIST, s.AMOUNT_DIST AS storeroomCount, s.UNIT, s.REMARK, s.MONEY, s.RECEIPT, s.TYPE_APPLICATION, s.SUPPLIER, spo.TO_DEPT_ID FROM cy_storeroom AS s LEFT JOIN p_storeroom_out AS so ON(so.STOREROOM_ID=s.ID) LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom_put_out AS spo ON(spo.ID=so.OUT_ID AND (spo.TYPE_APPLICATION='1' OR spo.TYPE_APPLICATION='4')) WHERE s.IS_IN='2' AND s.STATUS='0' AND FIND_IN_SET(spo.TO_DEPT_ID, #{storeroom.toDeptIds}) AND FIND_IN_SET(s.TYPE_APPLICATION, #{storeroom.typeApplication})
AND s.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeroom.name},'%')
AND s.REMARK LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeroom.remark},'%')

SELECT s.`NAME`, s.TYPE, s.AMOUNT, s.UNIT, s.REMARK, s.MONEY, s.RECEIPT, s.DATE, s.TYPE_APPLICATION, s.SUPPLIER, d.DEPT_NAME AS toDeptName FROM cy_storeroom AS s LEFT JOIN p_storeroom_out AS so ON(so.STOREROOM_ID=s.ID) LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom_put_out AS spo ON(spo.ID=so.OUT_ID) LEFT JOIN t_dept AS d ON(d.DEPT_ID=spo.TO_DEPT_ID) WHERE spo.TYPE_APPLICATION=3 AND spo.IS_PUT=2 AND spo.DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{date},'%')

SELECT c.`NAME` AS name, SUM(s.AMOUNT) AS amount, SUM(s.AMOUNT*s.MONEY) AS money FROM cy_storeroom AS s LEFT JOIN p_storeroom_out AS so ON(so.STOREROOM_ID=s.ID) LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom_put_out AS spo ON(spo.ID=so.OUT_ID) LEFT JOIN cy_canteen AS c ON(c.`NAME`=s.TYPE) WHERE spo.TYPE_APPLICATION=8 AND spo.IS_PUT=2 AND spo.DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{date},'%') GROUP BY c.ID ORDER BY c.ID

SELECT s.ID, s.`NAME`, s.TYPE, s.AMOUNT, s.UNIT, s.REMARK, s.MONEY, s.RECEIPT, s.TYPE_APPLICATION, s.SUPPLIER, s.IS_IN, s.TO_DEPT_ID, s.PARENT_ID, s.STATUS, s.AMOUNT_DIST FROM cy_storeroom AS s WHERE FIND_IN_SET(s.ID,#{ids}) OR FIND_IN_SET(s.PARENT_ID,#{ids})

SELECT cs.ID, cs.`NAME`, cs.TYPE, cs.AMOUNT, cs.UNIT, cs.REMARK, cs.MONEY, cs.RECEIPT, cs.DATE, cs.TYPE_APPLICATION, cs.SUPPLIER, cs.IS_IN, cs.PARENT_ID, cspo.NUM AS putNum FROM cy_storeroom AS cs LEFT JOIN p_storeroom_put AS psp ON psp.STOREROOM_ID=cs.ID LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom_put_out AS cspo ON cspo.ID=psp.PUT_ID WHERE cspo.IS_PUT='1'
AND cs.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeroom.name},'%')
AND cspo.NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeroom.putNum},'%')
AND cs.RECEIPT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeroom.receipt},'%')
AND FIND_IN_SET(cs.TYPE_APPLICATION, #{storeroom.typeApplication})
AND FIND_IN_SET(cs.SUPPLIER, #{storeroom.supplier})
AND cs.DATE >= #{storeroom.createTimeFrom}
AND cs.DATE <= #{storeroom.createTimeTo}
AND cs.REMARK LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeroom.remark},'%')
AND cs.TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeroom.type},'%')

SELECT cs.ID, cs.`NAME`, cs.TYPE, cs.AMOUNT, cs.UNIT, cs.REMARK, cs.MONEY, cs.RECEIPT, cs.DATE, cs.TYPE_APPLICATION, cs.SUPPLIER, cs.IS_IN, cs.PARENT_ID, td.DEPT_NAME AS toDeptName FROM cy_storeroom AS cs LEFT JOIN t_dept AS td ON td.DEPT_ID=cs.TO_DEPT_ID WHERE cs.PARENT_ID=#{parentId} AND (cs.ID=#{id})=0
